selected_skills.name: extract_numerical_values_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract numerical values from the table image to get the quantities supplied and demanded at $790.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the relevant numerical data from the table image for further analysis.

selected_skills.name: compare_numerical_values
selected_skills.purpose: Compare the extracted quantities supplied and demanded to determine if there is a shortage or surplus.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compare the numerical values of quantity supplied and demanded.

selected_skills.name: map_comparison_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the result of the comparison to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to map the comparison result to the corresponding option label (A or B).
